hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors # Step 1of3 OK: php environments_2_eol.php jenkins '{"task": "generate_eol_tags_pensoft", "resource":"all_BHL", "resource_id":"TreatmentBank", "subjects":"Uses"}' #-> generates TreatmentBank_ENV.tar.gz #-> lasted 3 days, 6 hrs; that is without any cache yet #-> lasted 10 hrs; if with cache already
#exit 0
# === Step 2of3 OK: remove all MoF records with habitat value(s) that are descendants of both marine and terrestrial OK. The 2nd filter. php rem_marine_terr_desc.php _ '{"resource_id":"TreatmentBank_ENV"}' #source: TreatmentBank_ENV.tar.gz #generates: TreatmentBank_ENV_01.tar.gz
#exit 0
# XXXXX Step Adjustments OBSOLETE ### This is now OBSOLETE. Worked before. Not neeeded anymore with our Textmining Strings. ### cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors ### php treatmentbank_adjust.php jenkins ### -> generates TreatmentBank_adjustment_01.tar.gz
# Step 3of3 OK: Clade Specific Filters for Habitat. The 1st filter. ###cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors ########## OBSOLETE php clade_filters_4_habitats.php jenkins '{"resource_id":"TreatmentBank_adjustment_01"}' #OBSOLETE php clade_filters_4_habitats.php jenkins '{"resource_id":"TreatmentBank_ENV_01"}' #OK | result taxon.tab will be only those with occurrences. ###-> generates TreatmentBank_adjustment_02.tar.gz
exit 0
### XXXXX This is now OBSOLETE. Not needed anymore with our new Textmining Strings #php georgia_cntry_vs_state.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "TreatmentBank_adjustment_02"}' #OK ### generates TreatmentBank_adjustment_03.tar.gz
### XXXXX This is now OBSOLETE. Not needed anymore with our new Textmining Strings #php dwca_MoF_reassign_values.php _ '{"resource_id":"TreatmentBank_adjustment_03", "resource":"MoF_reassign_values"}' #OK ### generates TreatmentBank_adjustment_04.tar.gz
### === LAST STEP: copy TreatmentBank_adjustment_02.tar.gz to TreatmentBank_final.tar.gz OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp TreatmentBank_adjustment_02.tar.gz TreatmentBank_final.tar.gz ls -lt TreatmentBank_adjustment_02.tar.gz ls -lt TreatmentBank_final.tar.gz ### then delete TreatmentBank_adjustment_02.tar.gz rm -f TreatmentBank_adjustment_02.tar.gz
#exit 0 # graceful exit, no error ### below updates CKAN date updated entry ### commented for now since server editors.eol.org is down #cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors #php ckan_api_access.php jenkins "8eaf28c4-67eb-4eb0-931e-7ac8f89a87cf"
